com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.Util

  • public final class Util
extends Object
    A storage point for utility methods that are generally useful.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    James Gifford

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        public static boolean empty(String aString)
        Determines whether the given string is null or "empty".
        Parameters:
        aString - the string to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given String is null or contains only whitespace.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(Object obj1,
             Object obj2)
        Determines if to objects are equal. This method handles null references.
        Parameters:
        obj1 - the first object to check.
        obj2 - the second object to check.
        Returns:
        true if the two objects are the same according to Object.equals.

      • compareAllowNull

        public static int compareAllowNull(Comparable c1,
                   Comparable c2)
        Compares two comparable objects where either may be null. Null is regarded as the smallest value, and 2 nulls are considered equal.
        Parameters:
        c1 - the first comparable
        c2 - the second comparable
        Returns:
        a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if c1 is less than, equal to, or greater than the c2.

      • upperCase

        public static String upperCase(String aString)
        Converts a string to upper case, where the string may be null.
        Parameters:
        aString - the string to convert.
        Returns:
        the string converted to upper case, or null if the supplied string was null.

      • rightTrim

        public static String rightTrim(String aString)
        Copies this String removing white space characters from the end of the string.
        Parameters:
        aString - the String to trim.
        Returns:
        a new String with characters \\u0020 removed from the end

      • leftTrim

        public static String leftTrim(String aString)
        Copies this String removing white space characters from the beginning of the string.
        Parameters:
        aString - the String to trim.
        Returns:
        a new String with characters \\u0020 removed from the beginning
